patterns: What is the philosophy of SciAstra?
Can you tell me more about SciAstra?
responses: We, at SciAstra, believe that education should not just be about cracking competitive exams. It should not be a race; rather, studying should be fun for the love of science. We are helping students to think differently instead of just memorizing the concepts to qualify for competitive exams.

patterns: How can I pay for your services?
Tell me about the payment options
Are there any discounts or payment plans available?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard, and Paypal
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal

patterns: Tell me about your exam preparation courses
Can you list the exams for which you provide coaching?
Tell me more about the PCMB subjects
Which board exams do you cover?
responses: At SciAstra, we make students love science & prepare all 4 subjects- PCMB. You can crack IAT, NEST, JEE, NEET, Boards & so on. We guide students who want to become scientists and pursue research by helping them secure admissions in the top colleges for the same like IISER, NISER, CEBS, ICAR, CMI, IISc Bangalore, ISI, CMI, IACS, etc.

patterns: What is special about colleges that offer research?
Are there good placements by these colleges
Tell me about the research-focused colleges
What makes your recommended colleges unique?
Can you elaborate on the college admission process?
responses: Some of the Facilities of these colleges are Full Scholarship (up to Rs. 4 lakhs) with Zero/Minimum Fees providing Top International Ph.D. Placements along with Top Faculties/Scientists in a world-class infrastructure

patterns: Tell me about your success stories
How many students have been selected in the past?
Can you share some notable achievements of SciAstra students?
Tell me about the success rate of SciAstra
responses: 1000 + Selections, 500 + IISERs, 100 + in NISER/CEBS, 30 + in IACS, 12 + in ISI/CMI

patterns: How can I practice for exams?
What types of questions are included in your mock tests?
Can you provide some details about the structure of your practice exams?
Tell me about the difficulty level of your mock tests
responses: We provide practice through the latest pattern mock tests to help you prepare effectively for exams like IAT, NEST, JEE, NEET, and Boards. You can access both live and recorded classes, interact with mentors, and participate in doubt classes and discussions, all within our app.

patterns: Can I ask doubts directly to the mentors?
Tell me about the mentorship program
responses: Yes, you can connect instantly with our mentors through the app. We offer live and recorded classes, interaction sessions, doubt classes, and discussions. Feel free to reach out to our mentors for any assistance you need in your studies.

patterns: Tell me about the latest exam patterns
What are the latest exam trends?
Keep me updated on exam patterns
Can you provide information on the current exam patterns?
What should I know about the evolving exam patterns?
Tell me about any recent changes in exam structures
responses: Stay updated with the latest exam patterns by practicing our mock tests. We ensure that you are well-prepared for the evolving patterns of exams such as IAT, NEST, JEE, NEET, and more.

patterns: I want to schedule a session
Can you help me with session booking?
Tell me about the process of scheduling a session
Can I choose my preferred mentor for the session?
How flexible is the session scheduling?
responses: Booking a session is easy! You can schedule a 15-minute personal interaction phone call with our top mentors from IISc, IISERs, IITs, NISER, and more. Choose a date and time that suits you best.

patterns: What are the benefits of joining SciAstra?
How can SciAstra benefit my education?
Tell me about the unique advantages of SciAstra
What sets SciAstra apart from other educational platforms?
How can I excel in my studies with SciAstra's help?
responses: One-to-one live classes with top mentors from IISc, IISERs, IITs, NISER, etc., a customized study plan tailored to your needs, face-to-face doubt clearing sessions, and exclusive access to a private WhatsApp group for continuous support and assistance from our mentors. It's a personalized approach to help you excel in your studies.

patterns: What is the fee for the courses?
How much do the courses cost?
Can you provide information on course pricing?
Tell me about financial assistance options
Can I get discounts on course fees?
Are there installment options for course payments?
responses: The fees for our courses vary based on different programs. For more detailed information regarding the course fees, please visit our official website.Link

patterns: Tell me your support email and phone number
How do I reach out to you?
Can I contact you for general queries?
Tell me about your customer support
How responsive is your support team?
responses: You can reach us through the following channels:Email: support@sciastra.com, Download SciAstra app to reach us there too or Chat on WhatsApp with 7570020363
